com.here.android.mpa.guidance

Class VoicePackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.guidance.VoicePackage

  • public final class VoicePackage
extends java.lang.Object
    Return information about downloaded voice packages. Used in VoiceCatalog.
